duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate tours through a cloud-based system
Greet visitors and provide a welcoming experience
Lead one to two 90-minute tours daily
Conduct research and prepare tour materials
Memorize and educate visitors with useful and interesting information
Follow safety guidelines and monitor visitor behavior
Respond to questions and provide comprehensive overviews at each checkpoint
Work with management to develop revised tour routes
Maintain cleanliness and organization of the tour room and tour headsets
Draft tour metrics and provide monthly statistics

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Communication, Hospitality, or related field
